event.title: was established as a municipality on 1 January 1838

data.event: The parish of Biri was established as a municipality on 1 January 1838 (see formannskapsdistrikt).

event.title: 1 January 1910, the district Snertingdal was divided

data.event: On 1 January 1910, the district Snertingdal was divided from Biri to form a municipality of its own, leaving Biri with 2,815 inhabitants.
On 1 January 1964, Biri was incorporated into the neighboring municipality of Gj√∏vik.

event.title: April 2007, major damage in the church led

data.event: In April 2007, major damage in the church led to an extensive rehabilitation.
